templates.description: Account activation email

en.header: Complete activation of your FOLIO account
en.body:
{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your FOLIO account has been activated.

Your username is {{user.username}}.

To complete activation of your account, please use the following link to create a password for your FOLIO account: visit this link

If you do not create a password within 24 hours of the delivery of this email, then contact your FOLIO Administrator to receive a new create password link.

Regards,

{{institution.name}} FOLIO Administration

templates.description: Reset password email

en.header: Reset your Folio account
en.body:
{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your request to reset your password has been received.

To reset your password, please visit this link.

NOTE: If you do not reset your password within {{expirationTime}} {{expirationUnitOfTime}} of the delivery of this email, the link will no longer operate. Please contact your FOLIO system administrator if you are unable to reset your password.

Regards,

{{institution.name}} FOLIO Administration

templates.description: Password is successfully created email template

en.header: Folio account successfully created
en.body:
{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your Folio account has been successfully created. You should now have access to Folio. 

Should you have any questions or you have received this email in error, please contact your Folio Administrator. 

Regards, 

{{institution.name}} Folio Administration

templates.description: Username located email template

en.header: Folio account located
en.body:
{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your Folio username is {{user.username}}.

Please contact your Folio Administrator if you have any questions.

Regards,

{{institution.name}} Folio Administration

templates.description: Template for password changed email

en.header: Your Folio password changed
en.body:
Dear {{user.personal.firstName}},

This is a confirmation that your password was changed on {{detailedDateTime}}.

Did not change your password? Please contact your FOLIO System Administrator to help secure your account.
	
Regards,

FOLIO Support

templates.description: A workaround notice to batch library bill notices (e.g. aged to lost / lost item fee assessed). Unfortunately cannot put the amount due in the notice so it will have to be generic.

en.header: Action required: Return overdue item(s) that have been billed
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These overdue item(s) are considered lost, and your account has been billed for them. Unpaid bills may suspend your borrowing privileges.

Please return these items as soon as you can. When checked in, the lost item fee(s) will be removed from your account.

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

{{/loans}}
Log in to MyAccount to manage your items and to see and pay library bills. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Library Bill Notice - Batch

templates.description: Course Reserve check out receipt

en.header: Library course reserves checkout confirmation
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}, 

You checked out these course reserve item(s). Please return them by the due date/time so that others in your class can also use them. Course reserve items not returned on time may be charged overdue fines.

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Checked out on: {{loan.initialBorrowDateTime}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

{{/loans}}
NOTE! Course reserve items must be returned to the library from which they were borrowed.

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Course Reserves Checkout Receipt

templates.description: Notice sent to borrower after check out, for short-term loans.

Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}, 

You checked out these item(s):

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}

Return by: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

templates.name: Short Term - Checkout Receipt

templates.description: Inactive because cannot be batched, which is not tenable for SL and having many users with dozens of items they renew. Can revise if functionality improves in later releases.

en.header: Library renewal confirmation
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This item has been renewed:

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDate}}
You can renew this item: {{loan.numberOfRenewalsRemaining}} more time(s)

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Renewal Receipt

templates.description: Sent automatically when a due date is manually edited in FOLIO, for short-term loans (includes due date TIME). Inactive bc always gets sent in addition to checkout receipt if you change at the point of checkout, and not sending renewal receipts which are similar so trying to be consistent.

en.header: New due date for a library item
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This item has a new due date:

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Short Term - New Due Date inactive

templates.description: include due date TIME and is always sent individually

en.header: Library item(s) due soon

Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This item is due soon. Please return it before {{loan.dueDateTime}}.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
You can renew this item: {{loan.numberOfRenewalsRemaining}} more time(s).

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Short Term - Courtesy Due Date Reminder

templates.description: Notice sent 2 days after due date

en.header: Action required: Return overdue library items
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These item(s) are now overdue and may be accruing fines. Please return them as soon as possible.

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDate}}

{{/loans}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus. 

If you already returned these item(s), please ignore this email.

templates.name: Short Term - Renewal Receipt

templates.description: Overdue fines for returned materials, equipment

en.header: Library fines on item returned late
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This item was returned late and accrued the following fines.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by due date: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
Date checked in: {{loan.checkedInDateTime}}
Fine amount: {{feeCharge.amount}}

You can pay these fines through MyAccount. Outstanding fines may result in suspended borrowing privileges.

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Short Term - overdue fines on returned materials

templates.name: New Due Date

templates.description: Overdue notice for course reserves only

en.header: Action required: Return overdue course reserves
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This course reserve item is overdue and may be accruing fines. Please return it as soon as possible to the {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

Course reserve materials must be returned to the library they were borrowed from. 

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library. If you already returned the item(s), thank you, and please ignore this email.

templates.name: Course Reserves Overdue Notice

templates.description: This is just an automated billing reminder for SUL library card purchases. The privileges team will send detailed instructions on how to pay the fee.

en.header: Bill notice: Stanford library card fee
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Thank you for applying for a library card. Below are the details of your purchase:

Charged on: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Amount owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}
Fee type: {{feeCharge.type}}
Library ID: {{user.barcode}}

Additional info: Please refer to the email from sul-privileges@stanford.edu for detailed instructions on how to pay for your library card.
 
Best,
 
Privileges Department
Cecil H. Green Library
Stanford|Libraries
sul-privileges@stanford.edu
(650) 723-1492

templates.name: Manual Fee Charge for SUL Library card

templates.description: Overdue fines for returned materials

en.header: Library fines on recalled items returned late
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These recalled item(s) were returned late and accrued the following fines.

Title / Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by due date was: {{loan.dueDate}}
Date checked in: {{loan.checkedInDate}}
Fine amount: {{feeCharge.amount}}

You can pay these fines through MyAccount. Outstanding fines may result in suspended borrowing privileges.

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Recalled overdue fines on returned materials

templates.description: Notice to recall items, due date shortened to 7 days from date item is recalled.

en.header: Action required: Return recalled item
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This library item is needed by another user and must be returned by {{loan.dueDate}}. We were unable to get an alternative copy from our partner libraries, which is why you need to return this copy now. Recalled items not returned on time may be charged overdue fines.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
The item now needs to be returned by: {{loan.dueDate}}

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Recall notice

templates.description: Overdue fines for returned Course Reserves materials

en.header: Library fines for course reserves returned late
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Your course reserve item was returned late and accrued the following fines:

Title: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by due date: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
Date checked in: {{loan.checkedInDateTime}}
Fine amount: {{feeCharge.amount}}

You can pay these fines through MyAccount. Outstanding fines may result in suspended borrowing privileges.

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Course Reserves Overdue fines on returned materials

en.header: Action required: Pay Stanford lost key fee
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Thank you for reaching out to us about your lost key to your assigned study space.
Since the key is lost, and the room is shared with another graduate student, the room will need to be re-keyed. Below are the details of your bill:

Charged on: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Amount owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}
Fee type: {{feeCharge.type}}
Library ID: {{user.barcode}}

Additional info: Log in to MyAccount to pay your fee. You will receive an email from sul-privileges@stanford.edu when your new key is ready for pick up.
 
Best,
 
Privileges Department
Cecil H. Green Library
Stanford|Libraries
sul-privileges@stanford.edu
(650) 723-1492

templates.name: Manual Fee Charge for Lost Key

en.header: Action required: Return overdue item(s) that have been billed
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These overdue item(s) are considered lost, and your account has been billed for them. Unpaid bills may suspend your borrowing privileges.

Please return these items as soon as you can. When checked in, the lost item fee(s) will be removed from your account.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items and to see and pay library bills. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Short Term - Library Bill Notice

templates.description: Short term loan specific: a reminder library bill notice

en.header: Reminder: Return overdue item(s) that have been billed
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These overdue item(s) are considered lost, and your account has been billed for them. Unpaid bills may suspend your borrowing privileges.

Please return these items as soon as you can. When checked in, the lost item fee(s) will be removed from your account.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items and to see and pay library bills. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library. Note: If you have filed a Claims Return with the owning library, please ignore this message. We are still looking for them and will update you soon.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Short Term - Library Bill Notice - Reminder

en.header: Library item(s) due soon
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These item(s) are due soon. Please return or renew them before their "return by" date.

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDate}}
You can renew this item: {{loan.numberOfRenewalsRemaining}} more time(s).

{{/loans}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

en.header: Library fee notice
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

You have been charged a fee for the item below.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

Fee type: {{feeCharge.type}}
Additional Info: {{feeCharge.additionalInfo}}
Charged on: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Amount owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

en.header: A library item is ready for pickup
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

An item you requested is ready for pickup at the {{request.servicePointPickup}}. Please pick it up by {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}; otherwise it will be returned.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Pickup at: {{request.servicePointPickup}}
Pickup by: {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

Log in to MyAccount to modify your requests and check their status. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.description: Notice sent to borrower after library items are checked in at a library.

en.header: Library return confirmation
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Thank you for returning these item(s):

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDate}}
Checked in: {{loan.checkedInDateTime}}

{{/loans}}
Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

These overdue item(s) are considered lost, and your account has been billed for them. Unpaid bills may suspend your borrowing privileges.

Please return these items as soon as you can. When checked in, the lost item fee(s) will be removed from your account.

{{/loans}}

templates.description: Explanation for canceled request

en.header: Library request canceled
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Your request for this item has been canceled.

Cancellation Reason: {{request.reasonForCancellation}}
{{request.additionalInfo}}

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Request Cancellation

en.header: Action required: Pick up your library item before it is returned
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Come pick up the item you requested by {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}; otherwise it will be returned.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Pickup at: {{request.servicePointPickup}}
Pickup by: {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

Log in to MyAccount to modify your requests and check their status. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.description: inactive bc it sends out for each individual bill and cannot be batched.

en.header: Library bill and lost item notice
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This item is overdue and considered lost and a lost item fee has been assessed. Overdue items and fines may cause suspension of borrowing and Interlibrary borrowing privileges.

When you return the item, the lost item fee will be removed.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDate}}
Amount owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus. 

Thank you for your prompt response.

templates.name: Library Bill Notice - inactive
